name: Dungeon Raid VR
description:
Known controller support: PS3 Controllers. Other gamepads should work, but are untested.

This game requires a VR headset. It is currently only tested on the Valve Index and is not compatible with Oculus Quest or other headsets not connected to a computer.

This game requires Steam to be running and SteamVR to be installed.

Dungeon Raid VR is an asymmetric VR game that focuses on the combat between a powerful boss and several smaller, weaker heroes. One player hops into the VR headset and takes on the role of the big boss, and up to 4 other players can connect on keyboard and mouse or with a gamepad to control the heroes trying to take the boss down.

This was a solo project built over the course of 10 weeks for my Neumont Senior Thesis project. Thanks to this project, I presented as a finalist at Neumont Capstone Invitational 2021, a highly prestigious event for Neumont students.
